entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Indin River

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High 20 except 15 over northeastern sections.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing this morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming west 20 this afternoon. High 20 except 15 over northeastern sections. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 15.
